## Data Management Structure

To promote consistency and reproducibility, the SAEL lab follows a
standardized data management framework, including uniform file naming
conventions and directory organization. Lab members can access the full
structure
[here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/15gwvtf855YYQetF_ED7OJYPNQK2GFGw0sSl9HVp2tR4/edit?usp=sharing).
